Title: EU countries could agree on EU gas and LNG market reform by December
Description: EU countries could agree by December on a reform of the EU gas market which aims to increase scrutiny over methane emissions from the gas and LNG sector including imports into the EU, and increase the share of renewable and low-carbon gases in the existing gas grid. EU countries will also adopt more emergency market intervention measures affecting gas and LNG markets in November
Author: DE

Title: Egypt’s EGAS offers two LNG cargoes loading in November
Description: Egypt’s state-owned EGAS is offering two LNG cargoes that will load on Nov 1-2 and 7-8 at the 7.2 mtpa Idku LNG terminal through a tender closing on Oct. 25.
Author: CK
